name: covid-19
description: Transmitted through human contact, causes flu-like symptoms, including fever, cough, fatigue and shortness of breath

name: aids
description: Transmitted through sexual contact, causes throat inflammation, rash, headache and sores of the mouth and genitals

name: malaria
description: Transmitted through mosquitoes, causes fever, tiredness, vomitting and headaches.

name: measels
description: Transmitted through human contact, causes fever, cough, runny nose, inflamed eyes and a red flat rash

name: influenza
description: Transmitted through human contact, causes high fever, runny nose, sore throat, muscle and join pains and coughing.

name: ebola
description: Transmitted through direct contact with the blood or other body fluids of an infected person, causes influenza-like symptoms, followed by internal bleeding and decreased blood clotting

name: smallpox
description: Transmitted through inhalation of airborne Variola virus, causes common cold and fever, muscle pain, malaise, headache and fatigue

name: rabies
description: Transmitted through exposure to infected mammals, causes inflammation of the brain in humands and other mammals, followed by uncontrolled excitement and an inabillity to move parts of the body.

name: syphilis
description: Transmitted through sexual contact, causes skin rash, mucous membranes and lymph nodes.

name: hepatitis-b
description: Transmitted through direct contact with the blood of other body fluids of an infected person, causes loss of appetite, nausea, vomiting and dark urine.
